c_string Com_GetEx(c_string FileName)

format: ['FileName'] ...
| ['FileName'(basename)] ...
( doesn't allocs memory )

c_string Com_Get(c_string FileName)
 title of source 'FileName'
format: ['FileName'] ...
( doesn't allocs memory )
